website_summaries.verdict: These stainless steel sticks are fun and easy for all ages to use to roast marshmallows safely.
pros: The sticks extend to 45 inches long, keeping you a safe distance away from the fire
Each stick comes in a different color and the handles don't get hot
cons: They're a little pricier than some other brands, but this set also comes with 8 sticks instead of 5

customer_reviews.title: No better way to Roast a weenie, or marshmallow.
customer_reviews.text: We received our roasting sticks and even used them Saturday. Great quality, we love them. The only thing I changed is I squeezed the fork together on mine, see pic. I like to put both prongs through my hotdog for more control as I rotate it over the fire.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, well made, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for a sleepover for our daughters and their friends, ranging from 5-12 years old. The sticks are very easy to use- all of the kids could extend them to a length they were comfortable with near the fire, and the ends are blunt enough that I didn't have to worry about accident stabbings. Cleanup was super easy, just pulled silicone grips off and threw them in the dishwasher. No gooey marshmallow residue at all. Have used them several times so far and they still look new. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dogs Didn't Stay ON
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like the long length and telescoping feature. Each handle is a different color, which allows each person to recognize his or her own stick. The storage bag is handy. Cons: The hot dogs did not stay on the skewers. As the hot dogs roasted and shrunk, they repeatedly popped off and dropped into the campfire. We had more success roasting marshmallows. One of the skewers in my set did not have pointed tips. Instead the metal ends were blunt. Also, one of the skewers came apart the first time we extended it, but we were able to figure out how to put it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Girl

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These have a very cheep feel to them. They don’t seem like they would hold up for very long. I sent them back right away. When fully extended the pole actually bends like a fishing pole. I was afraid that a hotdog would actually fall off the end in the fire. If you are looking for good roasting sticks keep looking there are way better ones out there
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Hot dogs and s'mores
customer_reviews.text: That's why we bought these. For the most part, they are good. We like that they telescope which allows you to be back a bit from the heat of a roaring fire. My only real issue with them is the configuration of the two tines. They are bent outward so it is very difficult to spear a hotdog on it. Marshmallows are fine, since you do one on each tine. But I think I'll be bending them closer together to make it easier to poke a weenie on it. A few have complained about the holding bag. It is kind of cheaply made, but ours seems fine (for now).
customer_reviews.author: Gene Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We roasted hot dogs & marshmallows & they worked fine & cleaned up very easily. I was disappointed that we only received 3 different colors, 1 green, 1 blue & 2 orange. Since I don’t have young kids it’s not a big issue, but it was definitely would have been a plus to have all different colors. The bag & plastic protectors are very nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Patty McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: The family is going camping this weekend and the parents reported to me that they thought the roasting sticks were awesome. They said whoever created them must have had ...
customer_reviews.text: This was an Easter gift for my grandchildren in TN. The family is going camping this weekend and the parents reported to me that they thought the roasting sticks were awesome. They said whoever created them must have had kids because they loved the fact that the sticks were color coded. I most likely will be buying more for the other families in my life. The price was exceptionally reasonable for the number of sticks provided. The fact that they extend to over 40 inches was one of the deciding factors in my purchase
customer_reviews.author: marilyn j voter

customer_reviews.title: Their standout length makes them stand out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because of their stand out length and they didn't disappoint. The tips are long enough to cook a bun length hot dog too so they'll handle marshmallows easily. They came with a nice case too that I wasn't expecting so that was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: jrh7675

customer_reviews.title: Much improvement to an already good design
customer_reviews.text: The newer design has a better handle, is more rugged and has an extended reach and “V” shaped fork. I would have preferred a new design with a “U” shaped fork but having the tines further apart than the older design; the “v” shape makes it more difficult to put a sausage on cross ways.
customer_reviews.author: Harbinger

customer_reviews.title: Show everybody how seriously you take s'mores!
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are amazing. We have hot dog and marshmallow roasts almost weekly now bc my kids (3&7) beg to break them out. Our friends have all been impressed by how much better they make campfires. Sturdy enough for hot dogs, double marshmallows, and illicit fencing. Not pointy enough to take out an eye on accident (maybe on purpose though). Easy to clean, telescoping for extra flair, and they come w a storage bag......11/10 - Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They extend very easily but are sturdy. I like how far they extend so my little one doesn't get too close to the fire. I also like that the tips are more like stubs instead of a sharp point for safety. The marshmallows still slid on fine! For the price I'm impressed with how many you get, the quality, and the variety of colors for the kids. The storage case is also nice and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom08

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received these roasting sticks. They telescope long enough that I don't have to worry about the little kids around the fire. They are nice in appearance and also seem to be sturdy. Included is a nice carry pouch and covers for the tines! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase these again
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin? One stick broke upon extending it. Countless hot dogs lost to the fire. I loved the design and was excited that I was getting so many for a good price...these were not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Larsson

customer_reviews.title: Great with a little musk
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. We had to bend all of the ends together more so items wouldn’t fall off. They were in a V shape and wouldn’t fit our marshmallows. We bent them in and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Good, but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: They'll do the job, but nothing like I expected. The handles are tiny, and they are extermely floppy when extended. Was hoping they were like my friend's who had ordered some, but these are significantly cheaper quality, yet more expensive. I like the zipper case for them, though.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great, Study Roasting Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use over a fire at cottage. They are excellent! They are sturdy and extend quite far to keep hands safe around fire. They come with a zippered travel bag so everything stays clean and together. We used them for both marshmallows and hot dogs and were quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: fifi61

customer_reviews.title: Buy the cheapies instead.
customer_reviews.text: The cheapie Coughlin ones are just as good if not better. These are not worth the premium price. To clean, burn the residue off, then scrub with soap and water. When you get back to a real sink...use a scouring pad to remove any black residue.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality in the set I received.
customer_reviews.text: After just one use, one of thee used out of the 8 broke just by retracting it. Disappointed in the quality, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fransstyle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be sturdy, ordered the 4 pack with extended forks, which will be handy, arrived in a nice zippered case, which helps to organize/locate them. Haven’t used yet, but appear to be nice & sturdy, even when extended.
customer_reviews.author: V M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and long enough to use with a fire
customer_reviews.text: The handles have a really nice grip, with grooves for your fingers. They extend pretty far, definitely enough where you can stand or sit comfortably away from the fire while using them. We were able to put one or two marshmallows on a stick at a time. The stick points are blunt so they will not stab. It comes with a case for everything and little red covers to put over the stick points when not in use. Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Brandey

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the comfort of the handle/grips. They did not get hot. Also loved the fact that they stretch out to be longer if needed. Kids loved the different colored handles. Easy to clean and put back into the travel bag they came with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Wife was sceptical.
customer_reviews.text: These roasting sticks are great. I thought they would be worth a shot, I wasn't super confident. They arrived and I used them that night. With 2 chorizos there was some flex but, no problems. The thing I like the best is how compact they are. I don't know about longevity but, at this point in time I would by these again and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Henman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for Grandpa to use with the grandkids so the can roast marshmallows they love these they keep the kids farther away from the fire and they are easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camp fire tools
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect. They are easy to extend out so you don't have to get to close to the fire. They are not to heavy and have padded handles.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for traveling.  Pack up awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Love the length, colors, and ease of use and storage.. The one complaint the rubber handles slip off when attempting to telescope. I kept having to put them back on for the kids.. They love to make them longer/shorter and with lengthening the handles slipped off.
customer_reviews.author: MellowMamma

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping with kids
customer_reviews.text: These were adjustable and sturdy. My 5 year old used for marshmallows and hot dogs and I had not fear she was too close to the fire. They cleaned up easy too and the bag is great to make sure we have them all packed up for next time!
customer_reviews.author: TeamNorthrup

customer_reviews.title: Love these roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: Love these roasting sticks! They work wonderful for marshmallows, hot dogs, bratwursts. Kids loved the option of how long they extend. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy A Schroepfer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ok it is slightly ridiculous to be reviewing these much less buying them, but... they work great. Solidly build. Don't bend. Clean easily (I just burned off stuck on bits in the fire but can be dishwashered) and come in a useful case. Feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: WSK

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Marshmallow Roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to say what my one favorite aspect of the roasting sticks is... I love the length. They were perfect for our 3 and 4 year old grandchildren to use to roast marshmallows and stay a safe distance from the fire. They cleaned up beautifully with very little effort. And I really like the storage pouch. We just took off the red point protectors and put them in the bag while roasting, and then after cleaning it was easy to replace the protectors and put it all in the storage bag. I am surprised at how happy this little purchase has made me! No more searching for the old rusted roasting sticks!!!
customer_reviews.author: corinn k.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for roast marshmallows. We even did hotdogs. I was a little nervous because they were heavier, but it was fine as long as I didn't have it all the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Vandever

customer_reviews.title: Good kit overall
customer_reviews.text: I'd say these are exactly what I expected, but I think a few things could be done better. The tips could be sharper for easier / cleaner insertion and the shaft could stronger. I haven't broken one yet but know it's gonna happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jmutiger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Am very happy with this purchase. They are perfect for roasting marshmallows and so much more. Good price for all that you get, expandable forks, wooden skewers, storage bag, best of all... free recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Best Roasting Forks Yet!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best roasting forks I have purchased in the past 15 years. We use them mainly for smores. SOOOOOO easy to clean. Deserve an extra star for that! 8 colors means no fighting over whose stick is whose among 7 people. I took a star off my review because, upon initial use, one of the forks became detached from handle. Otherwise, they feel well made and sturdy and, did I mention, they are a BREEZE to clean?!
customer_reviews.author: krazyma335

customer_reviews.title: No More Wobbly Clothes Hangers
customer_reviews.text: If you've done much camping, at some point, you begin a search for something to skewer a marshmallow or hot dog. That part of my life is over.
customer_reviews.author: chadrico

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Wish they were a bit more sturdy. Very nice telescoping length for kids so they're not so close to the fire. Love the zipper storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: katrina4782

customer_reviews.title: Camping must have
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these based on reviews.. Can't go wrong.. well made.. worked really well for camping around the fire. Enjoy them every year we go camping .. Would buy them gain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for camping
customer_reviews.text: Love that these come with a storage bag, and are collapsible, for easy travel. A must for camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kat the Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item to get kids in on the fu
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for a kids group beach bonfire. We wanted the kids to be able to roast their own marshmallows for s'mores and be safe. These extended far enough to allow even 4 year olds to enjoy the fun of roasting marshmallows at a safe distance. They were not at all flimsy, didn't drop when extended and easily cleaned the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kat O

customer_reviews.title: Easy use, easy clean, easy family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes with a pouch for storage. Have only used with marshmallows and it was great. I am interested to see how it holds up to a hot dog when extended fully. It’s exactly like a radio antenna with a forked end. I could see the potential for bending if little ones use without help. Otherwise it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters birthday party. I liked them because they were a little longer than the others and they had a slight point at the ends. They work great for marshmallows and hot dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Aramat

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. We were doing smores instead of cake. Everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: R. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Love these Marshmallow Skewers.
customer_reviews.text: We love the extended length on these skewers. We can now sit comfortably back in our chairs while cooking hotdogs or marshmallows over the fire. They extend out easily, hold the hotdogs and marshmallows really good. They are sturdy and the whole family is pleased with these after trying different ones.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyMan

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cooking over the fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking meat over the fire pit. Good for marshmallows as well. Remember to remove the plastic covers on the ends. The grips could be a little more mass to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.D.

customer_reviews.title: These break very easily
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product. The very first time we tried to use them, one of them broke as soon as we extended it out. A second one broke when my husband put a hotdog on it to cook over our fire pit. Guess we need to stick with good 'ol coat hangers. Would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meador

customer_reviews.title: Your product is wonderful. From the cool storage bag to the awesome ...
customer_reviews.text: Your product is wonderful . From the cool storage bag to the awesome roasting forks. No disappointment here.So colorful and well made. Compact yet fully extends . We are very pleased and will be looking forward to buying more of your products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dyanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer fun eating
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a set of these as a gift. They have telescoping handles which keeps your hands away from the flames. The color coding is great because everyone knows there own device. Easy to clean and come with their own storage bag! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these as a Christmas gift for my husband since he has been hosting our grand kids with S’mores over our fire pit in the back yard for many years. Our other holders have “died” and I am sure that yours will be a big hit as well as a family memory. Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen T. Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big family that likes S'mores!
customer_reviews.text: My kids can each get a color, they're easy to clean, extend to keep kids a safe distance from the fire, and are much sturdier than any other ones we have owned. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: R Tist

customer_reviews.title: Great fun roasting marshmallows on sturdy skewers
customer_reviews.text: We sent the MalloMe skewers to our grandsons for summer backyard fun. They used them the same day the skewers were delivered. The boys called and were so excitedly having fun roasting marshmallows with their parents on their backyard fire pit. Thank you for providing a quality product to give years of joyful fun to our grandchildren- and their parents, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Great for family campfires. Soaked in water overnight and there was no scrubbing needed to get off burnt marshmallow and char.
customer_reviews.author: kc-bug

customer_reviews.title: Great, convenient product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use with our backyard fire pit, and to take tailgating. They are really nice and compact, and the handles don't get really heated up. They also cooled down well after being removed from the fire. The telescoping head makes for a great tool to use no matter how big or small the fire is.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Telescopic Marshmallo sticks.
customer_reviews.text: Durable telescopic marshmallow or hotdog sticks. Loved the molded rubber handle and the handles are different colors for easy recognition.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Egan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I like these telescoping marshmallow ‘sticks’. They extend to 45” and keep everyone far away from the fire. They can also be used for hotdogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn255

customer_reviews.title: these are great
customer_reviews.text: i was not sure what i was going to get but these are great. very easy to use, clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These have been great to use over the fire pit. The extended rods hold up well and we're able to keep the little ones from getting too close to the fire. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CMartin

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet. They look great the colors are bright, only thing I don't like is the colored grips are not glued on and come off easily will crazy glue them my self will update on how they work extended with food
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are heavier And longer than I expected and have a lot of space between the two tongs. These are all great as it was easy to use and be safe with.
customer_reviews.author: Adi S Ramachandran

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasting marshmallows!
customer_reviews.text: We used our new roasting sticks for the first time last night. They worked just great. The size of the fork is perfect and it was very easy to rotate the marshmallows for even roasting. I really liked the telescopic feature.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Winters

customer_reviews.title: These are a package of 6.  Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to clean if you don’t try to cook the marshmallow residue on the metal tip. Yes, I tried it. It’s there to stay. Still works the same though.
customer_reviews.author: EZShoping

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting sticks
customer_reviews.text: We love these new roasting sticks. I really like how they collapse so they're easy to store. I also like that they are extra long so you don't have to sit so close to the fire, especially not the littles in my life. Well made, we are excited to use them this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family friendly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to keep the children further from the fire!! Family friendly!!! Great buy, easy to use and kids enjoyed making smores safely!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie M.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap.. 3 broke right out of the box... dollar store wooden skewers worked way better..
customer_reviews.author: lori moss

customer_reviews.title: Bag quality.
customer_reviews.text: So far, just taking them out of the bag the zipper tore. Extending the roasting stick it seems a little wobbly, however, I have not actually used them yet. Will update later. The biggest disappointment was the fact that they dropped $3.00 the day after I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The roasting forks came on time. W wanted to use them for a bonfire for our grandchildren when they visited. They worked great; however the gray fork came apart and would not stay together. All the other ones worked perfectly. My grandchildren enjoyed using them!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen G.

customer_reviews.title: They worked perfectly and are very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these sticks. Our cub scouts used them without burning themselves. (Alas, I cannot say the same for the marshmallows.) The sticks did not break or get stuck when extending them. They also come relatively clean using some simple steel wool.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works like they should. I like the bag to keep them together as we had previously purchased a random stick here or there.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati momma

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER easy to clean messy dried on marshmallows - love these guys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G

customer_reviews.title: Super Flimsy! Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: These snap into pieces so easily! We broke 2 or 3 the first time we used them on a camping trip with friends. Once they are extended the metal is extremely thin and easily bent. If you try to bend them back/ retract them they just snap off!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Swain

customer_reviews.title: They are okay....
customer_reviews.text: They serve the purpose. However they are already black from 1st use in the fire. They tend to get flimsy when fully extended. The zipper on the bag they came in was already broken when we first opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory for s’mores!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect s’mores cooking utensils! They extend quite far without bending, allowing our children to roast their marshmallows with much less worry about burning themselves.
customer_reviews.author: J, K, W, and N's  Mom

customer_reviews.title: Campfire Ready!
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect for making S'Mores or rosating wieners without having to worry about my grandkids being to close to the campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Lola GetzIt

customer_reviews.title: Most have for every back yard fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!!! I have 3 small kids we and cook outside a lot. They love these. Easy to use. Easy to clean. Comes with a storage bag and rubber tips for point. Don't toss them they will keep your bag looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for roasting marshmallows for s’mores! In door units as well as outdoor fire pits! The telescope ability of forks work well for either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy &well made
customer_reviews.text: The fork is sturdy so the food doesnt fall off & I love that they are telescoping! The pouch is really nice to keep them together when storing them
customer_reviews.author: Arletta Ray

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, compact, strong  and super long!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a Halloween Party and everyone loved them! We are looking forward to many years of use because they are very well made. Party on!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very sturdy and great to use for marshmallows or hotdogs.
customer_reviews.author: kynursin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Kids forget they can telescope in after roasting the marshmellows but a great product
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: These extended out very far. They are sturdy and were perfect for making s’mores.
customer_reviews.author: Victor F.

customer_reviews.title: nice set, extends to 42"
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, easy to clean, long enough to keep the kids from the flame, comes with a storage pouch
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Give me s’more!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. They clean up well and are good quality
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the grandchildren and great-grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: long handles keeps the little ones safely away from the fire
customer_reviews.author: Jo Pin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and well-made!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality forks. Durable and attractive. They work great and have a handy carrying case. We have used them a dozen times or more and they wash up like new.
customer_reviews.author: L. Minton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect distance for a Kid but Metal does get a hot.
customer_reviews.text: My number one goal was to get my kid at a safe distance from the fire. For that I give 5 stars. Metal does get hot so you have to be careful while removing whatever you are cooking. But this I knew buying the item. Overall a great campfire product. Compact easy to pack always ready.
customer_reviews.author: Vesp

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a gift so I didn't get to use them, but they looked to be of good quality and quite sturdy. I'm thinking of purchasing some for my own family. We received them in a timely manner, too.
customer_reviews.author: J Dins

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camping accessory
customer_reviews.text: So easy to pack, love the 2 prongs and all the colors
customer_reviews.author: JTK

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to carry and store
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to carry and store. Long enough that the grandkids can roast their own marshmallows without being too close to the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Got used sticks bummer
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research fell in love with these sticks. When I received them I noticed there was like house packing tape on the box and the bag totally smells like campfire. Not a bad thing but I purchased new not cool at all I haven't used them yet but I'm bummed from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. We use them with our fire pit. Very easy to clean and has a storage bag as well
customer_reviews.author: love cheer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: We received the package very quickly and we used them last night at our Halloween party. They were awesome and everyone was asking how to get them!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wedding and we had 0 complaints! Held marshmallows perfectly and arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.author: LaRat

customer_reviews.title: A campfire must have to keep your marshmallow roasting safe
customer_reviews.text: These campfire roasting forks were very good, particularly since we have 2 small children. They were able to safely roast their own marshmallows without getting too close to the fire pit. My wife and I appreciated the safety, and the kids enjoyed their s'mores.
customer_reviews.author: mpcjr001

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for our new fire pit! We have used them several times so far this spring and summer!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect campfire roasting forks!
customer_reviews.text: These totally exeeded my expectations! They extend to a perfect length and I love the bright colors and safety tips! Love the handy bag to store them in and they even added 10 bamboo skewer's, which I wasn't expecting. Shipping was fast and packaging was sturdy. This was a great buy and I totally recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: KatD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, I like the rubber on the handles, should make it easier to hang onto. Can’t wait to use them
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for S’mores
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, very easy to clean. Great seller, would order again

customer_reviews.title: Works as described—- safe and easy to use by small children
customer_reviews.text: I received what I expected from others’ descriptions and reviews. Well satisfied
customer_reviews.author: susan ireland

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for our camping trip
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our camping trip. I really like the quality and the extension of the forks. They were perfect for roasting hot dogs, sausages and marshmallows for smores.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a company cookout and everyone was impressed. Worked great for everyone's kids to roast marshmellows for smore's. They extended out to a nice distance to keep the kids safe and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! Great quality and price. These were a hit at a recent neighborhood bonfire. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Miss J

customer_reviews.title: Must have for camping!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! No more searching for sticks to roast marshmallows. We like the double prongs to roast hot dogs. The carrying case is perfect to just throw theM in our camping gear and go!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer99

product_meta.title: MalloMe Premium Marshmallow 45-inch Roasting Sticks Set of 8 Smores Skewers & Hot Dog Fork | Extending Patio Fire Pit Camping Cookware Campfire
product_meta.description:
Campfires Make Good Moments Great 

 The memories that are imparted to us by our loved ones are what matters most when enjoying an outdoor open fire. 

 Introducing the 45-inch Premium Roasting Stick Set from MalloMe. One of the top secrets to keep the fun going during campfire night is to have a roasting stick long enough to keep you completely safe from the burning fire yet leave your sweet treat with a mouth-watering toast. 


Unlike cheaper rip-offs, this one is perfectly designed for any kind of grill or fireplace. Take a closer look. 

Product Details: 

Wide Mouth Prongs (Great for Sausages) Hand Wash for Best Results 18/8 304 Stainless Steel Forks Multi-Colored Handles Eight 45” Telescoping Fork Skewers 
Absolutely Perfect For: 

Backyard Reunions Road Trips After-Barbecue Desert Campfire Hiking 
Everyone from the kids to the elders will surely fall in love with this lengthy stick in no time. Reach the flames without getting touched by it. 
 According to a lot of customers, 45 inches is really the perfect size when you consider how far out can the heat of a fireplace can go. 


Don't get left behind, buy today and get it shipped straight to your doorstep right away.
feature_bullets: THE ALL NEW 45-INCH VERSION – Our previous 34-inch roasting sticks garnered so much positive reviews that we've decided to put out an even longer version of it. The critically acclaimed marshmallow skewer is now back with more length for a much safer night around the campfire. All those scary stories are much better told when you have the appropriate roasting sticks with you. Keep it comfortable and chill with the All New MalloMe Premium 45-inch Marshmallow Roasting Sticks.

EXTREMELY HANDY ROASTING STICKS – We know how hard it is to pack your bags for camping trips. To solve such recurring problem, we made sure that our roasting sticks are retractable. Keep it very handy whenever you don't need its full length. Just pull it all back out once campfire night begins.

VIBRANT DESIGN – Campfire stories and telescoping are made even better when you have these excitingly colored roasting sticks. Pick and represent your favorite color as another memorable outdoor-night spent with friends and family rolls over.

THE LEADING CHOICE – Numbers never lie and this is why you can trust the countless people who left a positive review on our 34-inch MalloMe Premium Marshmallow Roasting Sticks. Rip off versions of these premium roasting sticks break easily or leave burnt marks on the stick leaving it very dangerous and unhealthy to use in the future. This is why our customers can't help but fall in love with our roasting sticks impeccable stainless-steel feature that gives you exactly what it promises.

A PERFECT GIFT THIS HOLIDAY SEASON – The Christmas season is arriving faster than anyone thought. With 8 variously colored roasting sticks and some other freebies included in this pack, nobody can say this isn't the perfect gift for your adventurous family and friends. Who knows, everybody in your squad might be using 45-inch MalloMe Premium Marshmallow Roasting Sticks during your next camping trip!
